decoworld.model.world.safehouse.furniture

Class Bed

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.safehouse.furniture.Bed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasClick, HasCollision, HasPhysicsBox, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem

    public class Bed
extends WorldEntity
implements HasPhysicsBox, HasCollision, HasClick
    This will store a player's bed inside their safehouse and the properties for it. Invariant: 1 <= comfort <= 10, 1 <= size <= 10 user != null, user is a valid user in the game
